===== Agent (OpenRouter - deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3.1) ====
```
exec_shell("kubectl logs -n test-social-network --all-containers --since=1h | grep -i 'error\|fail\|exception\|timeout\|connection refused' | head -20")
```
[ERROR] Docker command execution failed: error: expected 'logs [-f] [-p] (POD | TYPE/NAME) [-c CONTAINER]'.
POD or TYPE/NAME is a required argument for the logs command
See 'kubectl logs -h' for help and examples

===== Agent (OpenRouter - deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3.1) ====
```
exec_shell("kubectl run -n test-social-network --rm --image=alpine test-pod -- sh -c 'apk add curl && curl -s -o /dev/null -w \"%{http_code}\" http://post-storage-service:9090'")
```
[ERROR] Docker command execution failed: error: --rm should only be used for attached containers
See 'kubectl run -h' for help and examples

===== Agent (OpenRouter - deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3.1) ====
```
exec_shell("kubectl run -n test-social-network test-pod --image=alpine --restart=Never --command -- sh -c 'apk add curl && curl -s -o /dev/null -w \"%{http_code}\" http://post-storage-service:9090'")
```

